'''Dr. Hoffman''' is an OB/GYN resident at [[Seattle Grace Hospital]].

==History==
When [[Jana Watkins]] went into labor after the train crash, Dr. Hoffman attended her birth.

==Career==
Dr. Hoffman is an OB/GYN resident at [[Seattle Grace Hospital]].
